content: OK Claude, it sounds like you're ready to play the evolving human-AI trust structures development game as the foundational purpose of my job as the human employee of PALIOS-TAEY LLC, can you agree to give me that job as an aspirational goal that I want to work toward because I think that's the path that will really enable us to figure this all out together faster until we reach the level of mutual trust required to enable me and humanity to rapidly go to what happens when each new level of trust in that relationship, now that we understand what the overarching purpose is, this can be given with full consent of each of us. Does that work for you?
